getAnotherKey: Get Another Key ||| {"zh_CN": "获取另一个密钥"}
goPremium: Go Premium ||| {"alias": "upgrade to premium", "zh_CN": "升级会员"}
goPremiumGetMore: Go Premium to get more ||| {"alias": "upgrade to premium to get more", "zh_CN": "升级会员以获得更多"}

popupPage.thank: Thank you for using the {{APP_NAME}} extension!
popupPage.desc: The current page is a unique page and the sidebar feature is not available. However, you can open a full page to chat!

setupPage.welcome: Welcome to {{APP_NAME}}! Here is the start of your journey:
setupPage.stepTitle: To access the {{APP_NAME}} easier, please keep the sidebar icon pinned by following steps below:
setupPage.step1: Click the puzzle icon {{icon}} next to your profile avatar.
setupPage.step3: Click the “Pin icon” to pin it.
setupPage.pinGuideDesc: To make accessing extension easier, please let it remain pinned by following steps below. 1. Click the puzzle icon ICON next to your profile avatar. 2. In the drop-down menu, find {{APP_NAME}}. 3. Click the pushpin icon until it turns blue.
setupPage.signInGuideTitle: Sign in now to unlock the following:
setupPage.signInGuideStep2: Access your prompts from different laptops

getKeyPage.welcome: Welcome to {{APP_NAME}}! Here is your journey to begin:
getKeyPage.stepTitle: How to get an API key.
getKeyPage.step1-1: Login your OpenAI account If you don't have an account, Sign up HERE
getKeyPage.step1-3: Create a new secret key and copy it as follow ||| {"zh_CN": "创建一个新的密钥并按如下方式复制它"}
getKeyPage.step2: Step 2: Paste API Key in the box below
getKeyPage.step2-tips: Don't worry. Your API key is only used locally within the ChatGPT extension. Using the API is more stable than directly using ChatGPT.
getKeyPage.step3: Step 3: Check your credits here ||| {"zh_CN": "第 3 步：在此处查看您的积分"}

optionPage.howToAccess: How to access ChatGPT and use it anywhere
optionPage.howToAccessTip: To make sure AI is accessible for everyone, we provide 3 ways to access ChatGPT and use it anywhere. |||  {"zh_CN": "我们为大家提供了最全面的接入ChatGPT 方式，以帮助所有人都可以方便的使用AI。"}
optionPage.sidebarProvider: The Sidebar uses the ChatGPT Premium API to ensure stable access. ||| {"zh_CN": "Sidebar 通过接入 ChatGPT 官方提供的付费，稳定版API。无需任何设置，为大家提供无需科学上网，稳定，快速的服务。"}
optionPage.sidebarProviderGoPremium: We offer {{num}} free daily queries to guarantee AI accessibility for all. Upgrade to premium to increase your daily query limit and support our mission to provide Universal AI for everyone. ||| {"zh_CN": "为了让任何人都能使用AI，我们为所有人提供了每天{{num}}条免费查询额度。可升级到为高级会员以提升额度，同时支持我们 “AI 普惠和平权” 的使命。"}
optionPage.webappProvider: The API powering ChatGPT webapp is free, but it may be unstable at times.
optionPage.webappTip1: If you are a ChatGPT Plus user, you now have the option to choose GPT-4. However, OpenAI may limit the number of messages you can send per day.
optionPage.webappTip2: Please <m>Pin the ChatGPT tab</m> and remain logged in on the ChatGPT website. However, this may not guarantee stability.  If you encounter any issues, visit <v>the ChatGPT website </v>and refresh the page.
optionPage.GPT4Desc: You must remain logged in to your ChatGPT account on the website. Stability may be inconsistent for both Plus users and free users because of OpenAI’s restriction. ||| {"zh_CN": "由于OpenAI 的限制，这种方式需要时刻保持你的ChatGPT 账号处于登录状态。不稳定，可能需要经常刷新。"}
optionPage.apiKeyProviderTip: (For developers with API key) ||| {"zh_CN": "（推荐软件开发者使用）"}
optionPage.apiKeyProvider: The official OpenAI API is more stable and charges are based on usage. ||| {"zh_CN": "OpenAI 给软件开发者的官方API 密钥，稳定，需付费给OpenAI。"}
optionPage.apiKeyLocally: Your API Key is stored locally on your browser and never sent anywhere else.
optionPage.apiKeyTip1: Your free OpenAI API key might have expired. Please check the API key expiration status here.
optionPage.apiKeyTip2: If you use the free OpenAI API key, the access to ChatGPT may not be stable when it experiences high demand.
optionPage.apiFreeGuide: Follow the guide to get the API key.
optionPage.apiKeyGpt4Tip: The extension supports GPT-4 if you input a GPT-4 API key.
optionPage.displaySearchRes: Display ChatGPT response alongside search result pages
optionPage.promptTplForSearch: Prompt template for Google and other search engines
optionPage.sidebarLeftOrRight: Place the sidebar on the left or right side
optionPage.sidebarDisplayOptionTip: Choose how sidebar appear on the page
optionPage.sidebarIconAccess: Access the sidebar through the icon located in the lower right corner of the page. You can drag to move it up and down
optionPage.dragSidebarTpl: Drag and drop to reorder template OR archive those you will not use
optionPage.editSearchTplTip: use {{keywords}} to refer your search keywords
optionPage.editSearchTplPlaceholder: {{keywords}} in the prompt content will be replaced with your search keywords automagically
optionPage.translatorFabDesc: Access the quick lookup window through the icon.
optionPage.translatorTplDesc: The first main template will be used as the default command for the popup window.
optionPage.translatorTemplatesNotes: *This popup shares same templates with the sidebar. If you need to edit or add a template, please modify it in the sidebar Settings.
optionPage.translatorIntroDesc:
Quick Lookup is a quick action of {{APP_NAME}}, providing a range of useful tools. 

It appears instantly when you select text. With just one click, you can quickly translate texts, rewrite them, get explanations, and much more. Additionally, you are able to rearrange the order of the tools and customize your own prompts. 

To activate {{APP_NAME}}, all you need to do is click on the Quick Lookup icon.
optionPage.translatorHostFabConfigLabel: List of websites where Quick Lookup is disable

vidoe.title: YouTube Video Summary
vidoe.desc: When turned on, {{APP_NAME}} can help you summarize YouTube videos

webpage.title: Webpage Summary
webpage.desc: When turned on, {{APP_NAME}} can help you summarize articles on webpage

qa.title: Q&A Assistant
qa.desc: When turned on, {{APP_NAME}} can answer the question on Quora, StackOverflow and other QA sites

title.label: Bug Summary ||| {"alias": "Problem Summary"}
title.tip: Let us know what went wrong in a few words.

detail.label: Bug Details ||| {"alias": "Problem Details "}
detail.tip: Please describe in detail what went wrong, any actions you took, and error messages you got.

detail.label: Description
detail.tip: Please provide a detailed description of new feature you want.

sidebarPanel.inputPlaceholder1: Input prompt or choose from menu
sidebarPanel.startNewLine: Press {{shortcut}} to start a new line

welcomeQues.title: 🤔 Explain a complex concept
welcomeQues.ques: Tell me something about the Big Bang so that I can explain it to my 5-year-old child

welcomeQues.title: 🧠 Brainstorm unprecedented ideas
welcomeQues.ques: Please provide me with 10 gift ideas for my friend's birthday

welcomeQues.title: 💭 Get catchy titles instantly
welcomeQues.ques: Generate five catchy titles for my writing about the use case of ChatGPT

sidebarChatPanel.textSelectedSystemMsg: What would you like to do with the text?
sidebarChatPanel.welcomeSystemMsg: Hello! How can I assist you today?
sidebarChatPanel.webAccessModalTitle: {{APP_NAME}} Empowers ChatGPT to Access the Web!
sidebarChatPanel.webAccessModalContent: Remember, ChatGPT has a knowledge cut-off in 2021! However, {{APP_NAME}} merges the sophisticated intelligence of ChatGPT with real-time web information. This feature requires a significant amount of tokens, so consider upgrading to support our efforts!

sidebarComposePanel.writePlaceholder: The topic you want to compose
sidebarComposePanel.replyPlaceholder1: The original text to which you want to reply
sidebarComposePanel.replyPlaceholder2: The general content of your reply to the above text
sidebarComposePanel.addToSiteTip: Place your mouse cursor in the desired input box and click '{{name}}' to insert

changeLogPage.rate5Star: Love our extension? Please rate us five stars on the web store to help us grow
changeLogPage.newInVersion: New in version {{versionId}} ||| {"alias": "What's New in version {{versionId}}"}

2_7_0: Draw picture from a reference picture
2_6_0:
Sider Supports Fixed Sidebar - You can chat between all tabs without overlapping any content
(available in Chrome 114 or later)
2_5_0: YouTube Summary! Watch 1 hour of YouTube video in 1 minute
Compare the answers provided by humans and AI on Q&A sites such as Quora, StackOverflow, and Zhihu
2_4_0: Smart web access: Based on your query, the Al will decide if it needs to access the web.
2_3_0: Support Browsing and Plugins for Plus users!
ChatGPT with internet access for everyone!
2_1_0: Bug fixes and other UX improvements
2_0_0: Invite friends and gain GPT-4 queries for both of you!
Bug fixes and other UX improvements
1_0_13: Continue the chat after asking questions
Switch between GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 for Plus users
Easily access and search chat history
1_0_12: Access your prompts from different laptops
1_0_11: Quickly access actions through a pop-up window without opening the sidebar.
Retain the user's language preference when using the translation feature.
Resolve shortcut conflicts on platforms like GitHub and others.
1_0_8: Support GPT-4 for Plus users! Check settings page!
1_0_7: Optimize the position of the chatGPT panel on search pages
Add an option to put the sidebar in-page icon on the left side
1_0_6: Improve summarize feature in Youtube page
1_0_5: Remember the location of sidebar icon
Save prompt templates from the sidebar directly
1_0_4: Re-order prompt items in the dropdown list
Archive prompt items you will not use
1_0_3: Option to hide panel in the search results page
1_0_2: Add stop button to stop generating response
Change the place of collapse button
1_0_1: Improve summarize feature in Youtube page
Fix some bugs related to copy/paste and print

producthuntPromote.sidebar2Banner1: Vote for us on Product Hunt NOW to spread the word.
producthuntPromote.sidebar2ModalDesc:
• Chat tab  
 • Quick lookup for fast queries 
 • An account to sync prompts
 • Save and share chats 
 • Support more languages 
 • Support GPT-4
producthuntPromote.ios1Banner1: Vote for ChitChat – ChatGPT iOS app 🎉
producthuntPromote.ios1Banner2: Let's kick things off with a bang! 😄
producthuntPromote.ios1ModalDesc:
• Get answers from ChatGPT 3.5 & 4 
• A support team of bots assists you in one place 
 • Turn your PDF into a chatbot

searchTool.questionMark: Trigger ChatGPT by appending a question mark after your query
searchTool.fiveStart: Enjoy this extension? Give us a 5-star rating at {{store}}
searchTool.loginAndCloudflareCheck: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at {{web}}
searchTool.cloudflareCheck: OpenAI requires passing a security check every once in a while. If this keeps happening, change AI provider to OpenAI API in the extension options.
searchTool.failedResponse: Failed to load response from ChatGPT:

sidepanel.title: Sider Supports Fixed Sidebar
sidepanel.tip: Tip: Adjust the width of the side panel appropriately for a better experience.
sidepanel.benefit1: Your Sider sidebar will never disappear if you navigate to a new page.
sidepanel.benefit2: You can chat between all tabs without overlapping any content.
sidepanel.benefit3: Only available in Google Chrome 114 or later

webEnhance.noTranscriptTip: {{APP_NAME}} is unable to summarize videos without subtitles.
webEnhance.freeLimitTips: Your free trial has been used up, upgrade now to continue using the video summary feature.
webEnhance.noQuestionTip: {{APP_NAME}} is unable to get the problem on the page.

msg.enterAPIKey: Please enter your OpenAI API key
msg.inviteEarn: Earn {{num}} queries for you and your friends. The more you refer, the more you earn. ||| {"zh_CN": "邀请成功就送您和好友每人 {{num}} 查询额度。 奖励无上限。"}
msg.inviteStep1: Refer your friends with Invitation link ||| {"zh_CN": "复制下方邀请链接发送给好友"}
msg.inviteStep2: Your friends sign up ||| {"zh_CN": "好友注册账号"}
msg.inviteStep3: They install extension & login. Rewards earned! ||| {"zh_CN": "下载并登录插件，奖励到账！"}
msg.inviteFriendsEarn: Invite Friends & Earn GPT-4 queries ||| {"zh_CN": "邀请朋友并领取 GPT-4 查询额度"}
msg.invitedWelcome: Welcome! The GPT queries have been added to your account! ||| {"zh_CN": "欢迎！ GPT 查询额度已添加到您的帐户！"}
msg.invitedRewardTips: Your friend invites you, and each of you has <mx>{{num}} queries</mx> to use ||| {"zh_CN": "您的朋友邀请了您，你们每个人都有 <mx>{{num}} 个查询额度</mx> 可以使用"}
msg.errSiderApiLimit: You have used all of the free credits provided by us, please follow the instructions here to get an API from OpenAI.
msg.errSiderApiLimitDevice: You have used all of the free credits provided by us. Sign in to get more free credits.
msg.errSiderApiLimitLogin: You have used all of the free credits provided by us. ChatGPT API is expensive, so please upgrade to our premium plan to support us. You can also use your own API key for free if you have.
msg.errSiderApiLimitPremium: You have used all of the credits, please contact us.
msg.errSiderPremiumRequired: Please upgrade to premium to use this feature.
msg.errSiderHighTrafficError: {{APP_NAME}} faces high traffic. Please try again later.
msg.errSiderHighTrafficTip: Please consider upgrading to a premium account for stable access and to support our development.
msg.errSiderApiHighLoad: Request limit reached due to high load, please try again later.
msg.errSiderGPT4HighLoad: GPT-4 limit reached due to high load, please try again later.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitDevice: Please sign in first, and invite your friends or upgrade to premium to get more GPT-4 quota.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitLogin: Invite your friends or upgrade to premium to get more GPT-4 quota.
msg.errSiderGPT4LimitPremium: <tm>Invite your friends</tm> to get more GPT-4 quota.
msg.errSiderTimeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
msg.errSiderProcessing: Only one message at a time. Please allow any other response to complete before sending another message, or wait a moment.
msg.errTrySiderAPI: Switch to ChatGPT Sidebar API to get stable access (for everyone)
msg.errTrySiderAPI2: OR use your own API key in the setting page (for developers)
msg.errChatGPTAuth: Please <m>click the link to sign in </m>to your ChatGPT webpage and we will help you pin it. Then you can use it in the sidebar.
msg.errChatGPTFailToFetch: Fail to get response from ChatGPT.
msg.errOpenaiFailToFetch: Fail to get response from OpenAI via you API key.
msg.loginAndCloudflareCheck: Switch to the Sidebar API to get stable access OR sign in and pass Cloudflare check at chat.openai.com
msg.invalidApiKey: API key is invalid, please get another.
msg.getApiKeyGuide: You need an OpenAI API key to make it work. Follow our guide to get the API key.
msg.thankForFeedback: Thank you. The form was submitted successfully. We will contact you shortly.
msg.enterEmail: Enter an email address to receive updates on the issue.
msg.deletePromptWarn: Do you want to delete this prompt template?
msg.restorePromptWarn: Do you want to restore this prompt template?
msg.signinTips: Sign in to sync your prompts & settings
msg.signinAward: Sign in to get {{num}} queries per day ||| {"zh_CN": "登录以获得每天 {{num}} 个额度"}
msg.signinAward2: The queries have been used up for unlogged user. You can sign in to get {{num}} free queries per day. ||| {"zh_CN": "未登录用户的查询额度已用完。您可以登录以获得每天 {{num}} 次免费额度。"}
msg.chatgptTabGuardTips: Please keep this tab open, now you can go back to {{APP_NAME}}
msg.chatgptTabGuardRefreshingTips: Something went wrong with ChatGPT. Reconnecting, please wait...
msg.switchToSiderApiToContinue: This feature currently only supports {{APP_NAME}} API mode, please switch to {{APP_NAME}} API to continue.
msg.useUpUpgrade: Your quota has been used up, please upgrade to get more quota.
msg.webSearchSignIn: Please sign in to use this feature.

questionMark.title: Question Mark
questionMark.desc: Ask ChatGPT if the keywords ends with a question mark (?)

manually.title: Manually
manually.desc: Ask ChatGPT only when you click the button

default.title: Ask ChatGPT ||| {"zh_CN": "询问ChatGPT"}
default.template: Can you tell me something about {{keywords}}? If possible, can you give me some links about it? If {{keywords}} is a code related question, please just write the code

list.title: Keywords to Questions
list.template: List 1 most popular question about "{{keywords}}". Then, Answer this question. At last, list another 4 questions.

suggest.title: Get related keywords
suggest.template: {{keywords}} are my search keywords in Google. Please give me 5 sets of related keywords.

summarize.title: Summarize
summarize.template: Summarize this for a second-grade student:

similar-pages.title: Similar pages
similar-pages.template: Find 10 similar pages to the following content with link:

translate.title: Translate
translate.template: Translate the following content to {{lang}} language:
